title: DISPLAY_HELP_TEXT_THIS_FRAME
content:
0x960C9FF8F616E41C0x18E3360A// DisplayHelpTextThisFrame
void DISPLAY_HELP_TEXT_THIS_FRAME(char* pTextLabel, BOOL bCurvedWindow);Parameters:pTextLabel: Text label for this message.bCurvedWindow: Unused parameter.Shows a help message for one frame.
Do note that this message doesn't get added to the Pause Menu info section.
codeBlocks:
// DisplayHelpTextThisFrame
void DISPLAY_HELP_TEXT_THIS_FRAME(char* pTextLabel, BOOL bCurvedWindow);

-- Example usage for DISPLAY_HELP_TEXT_THIS_FRAME
DisplayHelpTextThisFrame('', false)
